top_comments.comment: These boys can not shoot, they almost took each other’s heads off. Spent about 8 rounds and hit him in the knee once. Take these guns off these streets 🤦‍♂️

comments_since_last_sample.body: So many families lost someone because of these people. The saddest part is many never got justice. And the murderers are set free after a short time. You’d think we’d solve these types of problem in today’s world where we are in such a time period...but primitive hunting/execution are just used with handy-down pistols.
